original: 陳留外黃人，曹魏忠臣范粲之長子。晉代魏後，范粲口不言，居於車上，足不履地，以示忠於曹魏，范喬也因其父之故終生未再出仕。
text: Chen Liuwai Huangren, the eldest son of Cao Wei Zhongchen Fan Can. After the Wei Dynasty in the Jin Dynasty, Fan Can’s mouth remained silent, living in the car, not touching the ground, to show his loyalty to Cao Wei. Fan Qiao did not go out in office because of his father.
